channel.title: Symphonies on Kritiker
channel.description: Recent content in Symphonies on Kritiker

item.title: Herbert Blomstedt's Beethoven cycle
item.description: As the most popular work of the entire orchestral repertoires, Beethoven’s nine symphonies are among the most recorded works in history: we have recordings from virtually all conductors, living or dead, and most great orchestras. As a result, seasoned listeners have all formed their own opinions on what these pieces should sound like (whether their opinions are formed by studying the scores or studying all the recordings is open to debate), and they are difficult to impress when new reocrdings come out.
